item.title: Coding
item.description: This blog gives an example of coding in python and r and how they can be combined. The last part is useful because it shows that these languages are not fully separate but are interrelated in a way and can be used together. yeet<-c(1,3,2) yeet ## [1] 1 3 2 hw = "hello world" hw[0:11] ## 'hello world' #R code chunk library(reticulate) hi<-"Walken here!" #Python code chunk hi="Hey I'm" print(hi,r.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

item.title: Exploration of Health Data of Hugo Certuche
item.description: This project was a very interesting one and as such I thought loud and hard about what data I was going to use for it! I am quite passionate about health and fitness. The variables that I collected using MyFitnessPal are Calories, which is the number that I consumed each day and EnoughFiber which is whether or not I got the recommended amount of fiber for the day. The variables that I got from my workout tracker are MaxHR, which is my maximum heart rate, AvgHR, which is my average heart rate, and WoDuration which is the duration of my workout.

item.title: Project 2: Modeling, Testing, and Predicting
item.description: #0. This project was a very interesting one and as such I thought loud and hard about what data I was going to use for it! I am quite passionate about health and fitness. The variables that I collected using MyFitnessPal are Calories, which is the number that I consumed each day and EnoughFiber which is whether or not I got the recommended amount of fiber for the day. The variables that I got from my workout tracker are MaxHR, which is my maximum heart rate, AvgHR, which is my average heart rate, and WoDuration which is the duration of my workout.

item.title: Resume
item.description: Hugo Certuche Education Carnegie Vanguard High School 2013-2017 University of Texas at Austin 2017-2021 Work Experience Customer Service at Dental Office 2015-2020 Health Coach 2021-Present Skills Long term experience with building computers and with electronics Motivational Interviewing Accomplishments Honor Roll UT Austin Fall 2020 Interests Singing Building Legos Reading about the universe Stephen Hawking Contact Info: sebastian.certuche@utexas.edu
